name: Senior Software Developer
desc1: Specific Requirement :We are looking for Technical ninja who want to help us Design/Develop/Deploy cutting edge scalable products to meet our business requirements. We are building out a team and looking for multiple levels but you should have at least 5 years of programming experience.We need Full stack developer role to lead, manage a team of App & Web. UX/ UI design understanding. Development with Flutter, React JS, React Native, Node, Python, Java etc. API plugging’s workflow, concurrency, multithreading. Server integration- Exp in Product management. Cross functional knowledge in development, testing deployment, maintenance. Team Management, hiring, guiding, training. Lead R&D. Strong in Flutter, Python development environment.

Python, Java• Experience in front-end JavaScript frameworks such Angular, React, Vue JS, React Native, Native Script, Flutter• Effective programming skills in TypeScript• Working experience with databases such as MongoDB, SQL, and Oracle.• Knowledge of UI rendering programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JQuery• Excellent at QA Testing Procedures and Cloud (AWS and Azure)• Should be an Excellent data structure & algorithm and problem-solving skills.• Working knowledge with JavaScript frameworks and libraries• Build features and applications with mobile responsive design• Develop and design documents based on functional specifications• Good communication and teamwork skills• Develop medium to large scale applications using required technology, Database design and analysis.• Stay abreast of changes in technology and learn new technologies as needed.• Develop complex software components.• Document and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code.• Protect operations by keeping information confidential.• Accomplish engineering and organization mission by completing related results as needed.• Mentor junior-level developers.• Collaborate with the team to brainstorm and create new products.• Grow engineering teams by interviewing, recruiting and hiring.• Understand business needs and know how to create the tools to manage them.• Comply with the project plan and stay on the leading edge of development practices.• Advise team on software development and code creation.• Demonstrate strong knowledge proficiency in the development methodologies including Object-Oriented Development, Component-based Development, Test-Driven Development, Behavior-Driven Development, Design Patterns and Design for Reuse.• Work closely with stakeholders to obtain requirements, break them down to tasks, and manage a team of several developers.• Perform unit testing and integration testing of Apps and web applications with the test automation tools. Analyze and resolve performance issues in them.• Should be capable of Handling a product from planning phase to getting the product/project running which include, Product planning, Task bi-furcation, assigning tasks to the team and self-involvement, Setting the deadlines and working on the deadlines, Requirements Testing, Deployment, Maintenance, Security testing, etc.• Must be a proven performer and team player that enjoy challenging assignments in a high- energy, fast growing and start- up workplace.• Must be a self- starter who can work well with minimal guidance and in fluid environment.3. Experience: 5 years or above in building Mobile /Web Applications and Product ManagementSpecific Requirement :We are looking for Technical ninja who want to help us Design/Develop/Deploy cutting edge scalable products to meet our business requirements. We are building out a team and looking for multiple levels but you should have at least 5 years of programming experience.We need Full stack developer role to lead, manage a team of App & Web. UX/ UI design understanding. Development with Flutter, React JS, React Native, Node, Python, Java etc. API plugging’s workflow, concurrency, multithreading. Server integration- Exp in Product management. Cross functional knowledge in development, testing deployment, maintenance. Team Management, hiring, guiding, training. Lead R&D. Strong in Flutter, Python development environment.How to apply for this post ?Apply here or visit MORU.com.npApply NowThe deadline to apply for the above position is November 03 2020.

name: QA Engineer
desc1: Specific Requirement :QA engineer will be assigned set of duties around technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback. Design architectures Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases. Estimate, priorities, plan, and coordinate testing activities. Develop and execute performance test to ensure the delivery of quality APIs, mobile app, web app and other software applications. Engineer can be assigned any other duty related to QA and Tech support deemed appropriate by the management.What you’ll be doing:• You will develop testing strategies to ensure that applications are stable and production-ready.• You will deliver ROI by recommending tools and frameworks to enable automation.• You’ll develop and implement process improvements to enhance testing efficiency.• You’ll skillfully develop scripts on various test environments.• You’ll be self-reliant and proactively oversee dashboards to schedule & track system tests.What you’ll bring to the team?• You’ll bring the compulsory and essential experience of QA methodology and tools.• You’ll bring demonstrated experience of coding with automated testing tools and services.• Know-how of emerging quality assurance methodologies and best practices.• You have experience in management and communication with cross-functional teams

Design architectures Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases. Estimate, priorities, plan, and coordinate testing activities. Develop and execute performance test to ensure the delivery of quality APIs, mobile app, web app and other software applications. Engineer can be assigned any other duty related to QA and Tech support deemed appropriate by the management.What you’ll be doing:• You will develop testing strategies to ensure that applications are stable and production-ready.• You will deliver ROI by recommending tools and frameworks to enable automation.• You’ll develop and implement process improvements to enhance testing efficiency.• You’ll skillfully develop scripts on various test environments.• You’ll be self-reliant and proactively oversee dashboards to schedule & track system tests.What you’ll bring to the team?• You’ll bring the compulsory and essential experience of QA methodology and tools.• You’ll bring demonstrated experience of coding with automated testing tools and services.• Know-how of emerging quality assurance methodologies and best practices.• You have experience in management and communication with cross-functional teamsHow to apply for this post ?Apply here or Visit MORU.com.npApply NowThe deadline to apply for the above position is November 03 2020.

desc: Passion for programming in generalFocused, passionate and strive to find simple solutions to complex problemsAbility to learn new emerging technologiesSolid understanding of application components, front end and back endFollow through on commitments, meet deadlines, no cutting corners, consider other people's ideas, team player, learn from mistakes, document things and communicate honestly and proactively on anticipated issuesAbility to work on multiple projects simultaneouslt and effectively contend with competing prioritiesPossess strong troubleshooting, code optimization and refactoring skillsHave strong sense of ownership with demonstrased ability to work independently
desct: Job overview:Job Category:ITPreferred Gender:Male/FemaleJob Level:Mid LevelNo. of vacancy/s:1Salary:NegotiableExperience:3-4 yearsJob Type:Full TimeJob Location:KathmanduApply Before:02 Nov 2020Educational Descriptions:Required Education :BachelorExpected Faculty :Computer Science or related fieldJob Specification:Passion for programming in generalFocused, passionate and strive to find simple solutions to complex problemsAbility to learn new emerging technologiesSolid understanding of application components, front end and back endFollow through on commitments, meet deadlines, no cutting corners, consider other people's ideas, team player, learn from mistakes, document things and communicate honestly and proactively on anticipated issuesAbility to work on multiple projects simultaneouslt and effectively contend with competing prioritiesPossess strong troubleshooting, code optimization and refactoring skillsHave strong sense of ownership with demonstrased ability to work independentlySpecific Requirement :Make designs and technical decisions for projectsPerform unit testing by using different frameworksBe involved in all phases of the software development lifecycleProactively seek out and minimize pain points with the infrastructire and code baseKeep up to date with the latest technologies and introduce them as neededCreate next-gen solutions for unique and challenging use casesCommunicate proactively with Business stakeholders and provide design-suggestionsAnalyze, debug and fix defectsHow to apply for this post ?Apply through this post or send your CV to info@varminetech.comThe deadline to apply for the above position has already expired on November 02 2020.

name: React Native Developer
desc: Design and implement a mobile application for iOS and Android using React Native.Create a the scalable, testable, documented application so that we can grow the product over time.Keep up with technology changes in our space and leverages them when appropriateLeverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms.Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.Participate in product design, offer new ideas, and understand that not every idea will be adopted.Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native.Work independently to deliver software on time.Document all aspects of your work.

name: Wordpress Developer
desc: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a similar field.Proven work experience as a WordPress Developer.Knowledge of front-end technologies including CSS3, JavaScript, HTML5, and jQuery.Knowledge of code versioning tools including Git, Mercurial, and SVN.Experience working with debugging tools such as Chrome Inspector and Firebug.Good understanding of website architecture and aesthetics.Ability to project manage.Good communication skills.
